personal.name: Sarah Johnson
personal.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
personal.summary: Experienced full-stack developer with 8+ years building scalable web applications. Passionate about clean code, test-driven development, and mentoring junior developers. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud infrastructure.

jobs.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Led development of microservices architecture serving 500K+ users
Mentored team of 5 junior developers through code reviews and pair programming
Reduced deployment time by 70% through CI/CD pipeline optimization
Implemented GraphQL API reducing client-side data fetching by 40%
Championed TDD practices achieving 95% code coverage across projects

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built and maintained React-based SaaS platform with 50K+ active users
Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and PostgreSQL
Implemented real-time features using WebSockets and Redis
Collaborated with UX team to improve user engagement by 35%

jobs.title: Junior Developer
responsibilities: Developed frontend components using React and Vue.js
Wrote unit and integration tests using Jest and Enzyme
Participated in agile ceremonies and sprint planning
